attributes.action: release all information within the possession of HM Government about the activities and death of Hugh John Simmonds, CBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This subject should be dealt with under the Freedom of Information Act. There is more on that here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page7035.asp
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
